question: Which problem of human body can be treated by the process of Dialysis?
explanation:
Dialysis is a treatment that is needed when our own kidneys can no longer take care of body\'s needs. Dialysis allows people withÂ kidney failure a chance to live. When kidney function decreases to a critical level or complications arise, a person may need to start dialysis. Dialysis keeps your body in balance by:
  • Removing waste, salt and extra water to prevent them from building up in the body
  • Keeping a safe level of certain chemicals in your blood, such as potassium, sodium and bicarbonate
  • Helping to control blood pressure
